statements: UPDATE diversity_and_inclusion_initiatives SET initiative_name='Gender Equality Initiative', initiative_description='Promote gender equality in the workplace', start_date='2022-01-01', end_date='2022-12-31', initiative_type='Equality' WHERE initiative_id=1;

UPDATE diversity_and_inclusion_initiatives SET initiative_description='Support underrepresented minorities in tech', initiative_type='Representation', initiative_name='Tech Inclusion Program', end_date='2023-06-30', start_date='2023-01-01' WHERE initiative_id=2;
UPDATE diversity_and_inclusion_initiatives SET initiative_description = 'Diverse Hiring Initiatives', start_date = '2022-01-01', end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE initiative_id = 1
UPDATE diversity_and_inclusion_initiatives SET initiative_name = 'Equal Pay Campaign', initiative_type = 'Wage Equality', start_date = '2022-03-15', end_date = '2022-06-30' WHERE initiative_id = 2
UPDATE diversity_initiatives SET description = 'Enhancing cultural diversity within the organization' WHERE initiative_id = 1;
UPDATE diversity_initiatives SET start_date = '2022-09-01', end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE initiative_name = 'Inclusive Hiring Program';
UPDATE diversity_initiatives SET description = 'Improved work environment and inclusion practices' WHERE initiative_id = 1;
UPDATE employee_participation SET initiative_id = 2, participation_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE participation_id = 5;
UPDATE diversity_and_inclusion_initiatives SET description = 'Improved employee engagement through mentorship programs' WHERE initiative_id = 1;
UPDATE initiative_feedback SET feedback = 'Great initiative, looking forward to more opportunities like this!' WHERE feedback_id = 3;
UPDATE diversity_and_inclusion_initiatives SET description = 'Enhanced program features for better engagement' WHERE initiative_id = 1;
UPDATE employee_participation SET participation_status = 'Completed', participation_date = '2021-08-25' WHERE employee_id = 101 AND initiative_id = 2;
UPDATE initiatives SET initiative_description = 'Updated description', start_date = '2022-06-01' WHERE initiative_id = 1;
UPDATE participants SET participant_role = 'Manager' WHERE participant_id = 3;
UPDATE initiatives SET initiative_name = 'New Name', start_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE initiative_id = 1;
UPDATE participants SET participant_name = 'John Doe', participant_role = 'Manager' WHERE participant_email = 'john.doe@example.com';
UPDATE diversity_initiatives SET description = 'Updated description of initiative 1' WHERE initiative_id = 1;
UPDATE employee_diversity SET department = 'Sales', gender = 'Female' WHERE employee_id = 2;
UPDATE diversity_initiatives SET description = 'New description', end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE initiative_id = 1;
